content: --भाग (पुरोभाग) {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} obtrusive, officious. {2} fault-finding. {3} envious or jealous of; प्रायः समानविद्याः परस्परयशःपुरोभागाः <ls>M. 1. 20</ls> (पुरोभाग may here mean ‘envy’ also). (--गः {1} the front part, forepart, van. {2} obtrusiveness, officiousness. {3} jealousy, envy.
